backend/main.mo: Motoko actor providing user profile management, admin role control, and CRUD operations for property listings with access checks and blob storage support.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a feature to grant an admin role to a specific principal across environments, listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions summarizing all major frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, theming variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes for Home, Properties, Inquiries, and Admin pages using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Admin UI panel enabling granting and revoking admin access via principal IDs with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: UI helper explaining bootstrap admin access, showing current principal and copy option when user is not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/HomepageAut: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with reactive status and retry on auth collision.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Displays the user's principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button for admin access requests.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: Component displaying business name, address, and phone with icons using data from siteData.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Homepage hero section with marketing text, contact bar, auth button, and hero image.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: Client-side inquiry form with validation, mock submission, and success/error UI states.
Renders a list of inquiries with name, email, property interest, and message, or an empty state.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Responsive contact/social bar linking to phone, maps, YouTube, Facebook, and Instagram.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing business info, contact details, hours, and a small attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar with branding, links, compact contact bar, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout with header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/properties/Inlin: Provides an inline form for creating or editing properties with support for image URLs, uploads, and YouTube or uploaded videos.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Displays a property with images, video, details, and admin edit/delete controls, switching to an inline editor when editing.
Modal-based property editor allowing title, description, price, location, and image management.
Renders an image carousel with navigation, load error handling, and indicators.
Lists properties in a grid and shows empty state messaging; supports admin update/delete actions.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Defines property interface, static business info, social links, and seed property data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend admin diagnostics and environment details using React Query with fallback logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides grant and revoke admin mutations with error normalization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoPlayba: Loads a video blob's direct URL for playback and manages loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Handles client-side video upload with progress tracking and returns an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Returns an empty inquiries list while backend inquiry support is disabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Syncs a React state value with localStorage for persistent storage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Provides property listing queries and create/update/delete mutations with error handling and cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Checks whether the current caller is an admin using fallback methods and React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface handling authentication, admin checks, diagnostics, and inquiry management with multiple conditional UI states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public homepage displaying hero content, business highlights, and an inquiry section.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Standalone page showing an inquiry form for contacting the business.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Property listings page with adminâ€‘only create, update, and delete functionality using related hooks.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Guide explaining how to export content, images, and data for transfer to Google Sites.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines simple frontend-only types for user profiles and inquiries.
frontend/src/types/propertyVideo.ts: Defines property video type variants and logic to classify videos as YouTube, uploaded, or none.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts image files to data URLs with basic validation and size checks.
frontend/src/utils/icError.ts: Normalizes IC canister errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/videoFileToDataUrl.ts: Converts video files to data URLs without size limits for chunked uploads.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Provides utilities to extract a YouTube video ID, validate YouTube URLs, and generate embed URLs across multiple URL formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including admin-related requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests.
